manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The RoC Vitamin C Difference RoC research found that Vitamin C is most effective when combined with other antioxidantsRoC developed a 10% Vitamin C Blend bursting with potencyThis blend combines Vitamin C in its true form, ascorbic acid, with complementary antioxidants for maximum brightening & tightening for skin able to defend against oxidative stressors RoC Multi Correxion Revive + Glow Vitamin C Gel Cleanser Your daily dose of Vitamin C. Designed to deliver an instant glow, dissolve dirt & oils, and leave skin smooth & refreshed after one use. This invigorating citrus-scented cleanser contains brightening ingredients including RoC Vitamin C, Potent Fruit Extracts & Glycolic Acid. This power-packed formula extracts skin-dulling impurities trapped on the surface and replenishes skin with a Vitamin C-rich blend that brightens & boosts skin’s radiance. CLINICALLY TESTED RESULTS: INSTANTLY: Removes debris, excess oil, and other skin-dulling impurities. CLEANSE without stripping skin of its natural moisture INSTANTLY: 90% felt skin was softer* IN 2 WEEKS: 93% saw improved radiance* IN 2 WEEKS: 88% had a visible reduction in pores* Visibly improves skin tone & texture overt time. *Clinical data on file

Vitamin C Cleanser Multi Correxion 5 in 1 Eye Cream Revive + Glow Vitamin C Daily Serum Revive + Glow Vitamin C Gel Cream Line Smoothing Night Serum Capsules YOUR RECOMMENDED RoC REGIMEN CLEANSE without stripping skin of its natural moisture TARGET 5 main eye concerns with this multitasker to help the eye area look brighter, smoother and rejuvenated TREAT fatigued skin to maximize luminosity & reveal a visibly tighter, brighter and more even complexion MOISTURIZE + GLOW with a lightweight gel cream that delivers instant radiance & plumper-looking skin + 24-Hr hydration TREAT the look of fine lines & loss of elasticity with a potent retinol capsule sealed for optimal freshness AGE-DEFYING BENEFITS See an instant glow, dissolve dirt and oils, and leave skin smooth and refreshed after a single use Visibly reduce the look of discoloration, density loss, dryness, dull tone & wrinkles around the delicate eye area Visibly improve skin elasticity, texture and luminosity and the look of fine lines & wrinkles See instant luminosity & plumper-looking skin. Visibly reduce fine lines & wrinkles, firm & brighten the look of skin, and hydrate for up to 24 hours Visibly firm skin & smooth fine lines to address collagen-depleted skin for a renewed appearance WHEN TO USE AM & PM, as first step in skincare regimen AM and PM, to treat the skin around the delicate Eye Area AM & PM after cleansing and before moisturizing AM & PM, as the last step in your skincare regimen PM, as the last step in your skincare regimen or before your night cream

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and smooth
reviews.reviewText: This face wash leaves my face feeling clean and smooth! It doesn’t over dry my skin. It doesn’t foam up unless I use a face scrubber but still does a great job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: At 75 years old, I have finally started proper exfoliation. I have found this product to gently cleanse and exfoliate, leaving my skin feeling silky soft. Still wrinklesd, but very soft! Ha ha. I would highly recommend, and the price is quite reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Revive and Glow: RoC Multi Correxion Gel Facial Cleanser Review
reviews.reviewText: I recently discovered the RoC Multi Correxion Revive + Glow Gel Facial Cleanser, and I'm excited to share my experience with this fantastic skincare product. It has quickly become my new favorite go-to face cleanser, and here's why.First and foremost, the ease on the skin is remarkable. The gentle, yet effective formula is a blessing for those with sensitive or easily irritated skin. It cleanses without causing dryness or redness, and I appreciate how it doesn't strip away the skin's natural moisture. It's a rare find when you're looking for a cleanser that's both thorough and gentle.The packaging also deserves a shout-out. The sleek, user-friendly bottle is not only aesthetically pleasing but also practical. The pump dispenser makes it effortless to get just the right amount of product, ensuring that nothing goes to waste.The inclusion of vitamin C in this cleanser is a game-changer. After using it, my skin feels incredibly refreshed, hydrated, and clean. Vitamin C is known for its brightening and skin-renewing properties, and this cleanser does an excellent job of revitalizing my complexion.The addition of glycolic acid is another bonus. It offers gentle exfoliation, helping to remove dead skin cells and revealing a smoother, more radiant skin surface. This is particularly beneficial for improving skin texture and reducing the appearance of fine lines and imperfections.Lastly, I appreciate that this RoC cleanser is paraben-free and sulfate-free. It's clear that they've taken a more natural and skin-friendly approach, which aligns with my values in skincare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin feels really clean
reviews.reviewText: No dislikes at all but pleasantly surprised at the quality of this skin cleanser

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mature Sensitive Skin Revival
reviews.reviewText: I realize my view might be warranted for "grown" ladies like myself. And I'm saying right now, this brand and product is everything.First, I’ve had the most sensitive skin since I can remember. In my teens did the clear and clear fad...broke out. Tried Neutrogena... not for me. Gave in to Noxzema with a Loreal sensitive daily moisturizer through high school and college...got me by. By the time I reached my late 30s the struggle became real. I tried everything: Olay, Garnier, la mercier, and other over priced fancy brands I can no longer recall the name of. Bottom line, - they all weren't working. It wasn't just random breakouts; it was redness, dryness, dark circles, and tired skin.A lovely coworker recommended Roc (after I complemented her skin) and I haven't looked back. I've exercised and danced forever, and today at 42, still lift and run 4 times a week, drink greens daily, mind my nutrition, and have two teenagers...if I cheat on ROC for more than a month (because, yes, the Ipsy addiction is real), I see a difference. The glow, firmness, and circles are different. I'm not saying do not take care of yourself and ROC will fix it. I'm saying it's a great addition to your skincare routine if you're "growing gracefully" and doing all the right things. For those who have issues with it drying, you either need more water (or it's not for you yet). But from the girl (that I know) with the most sensitive skin to date, ROC was life changing when my skin matured. Hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Turned my skin orange
reviews.reviewText: I initially thought I loved this product. It helped with exfoliation, and my skin appeared younger. But after a while, I felt like my skin looked tan (and I wasn't going in the sun). One day I was pumping it onto my white buff-puff pad and realized the cleanser was orange, AND my sponge was stained with a carroty/brownish color. Then I realized my skin was also becoming stained. It's great if you want a sunglow. For me, it wasn't a good color. And my face was starting to look darker than my neck! After a week of not using it, my skin is gradually fading. I wish they had made this a clear cleanser. I hate to stop using it, but I’m not sure if I want that look…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My face feels so soft
reviews.reviewText: Just started using but my face felt amazing after just one wash. The smell is mild but nice. A little lathers up perfectly. I am eager to see long term results. Stay tuned to next bottle review- when I look 20 years younger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Noticeable Difference in complexion
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive facial skin so I had to dial down the time it’s on my skin, but even so, there’s a marked improvement in my skin’s overall appearance. It’s effective for me even though I only use it twice a week.

The Ultimate Game-Changer for Your Morning Skincare Routine Looking for a reliable facial cleanser that won't dry out your skin? Roc's got you covered. I've been using it for a while now, and I can attest to its gentle qualities and effectiveness in removing oil from my face post-workout. Plus, it's an affordable option that doesn't break the bank. If you're in the market for a new skincare product, I highly recommend giving this Cleanser a try.
